verses.verse: Therefore <S%G5620><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> dearly beloved <S%G27><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> longed for <S%G1973><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> crown <S%G4735><s%>, so <S%G3779><s%> stand fast <S%G4739><s%> <S%G5720><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%>, my dearly beloved <S%G27><s%>.

I beseech <S%G3870><s%> <S%G5719><s%> Euodias <S%G2136><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> beseech <S%G3870><s%> <S%G5719><s%> Syntyche <S%G4941><s%>, that they be of <S%G5426><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G5426><s%> <S%G5721><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I intreat <S%G2065><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, true <S%G1103><s%> yokefellow <S%G4805><s%>, help <S%G4815><s%> <S%G5732><s%> those women <S%G846><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> laboured <S%G4866><s%> <S%G5656><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%>, with <S%G3326><s%> Clement <S%G2815><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with other <S%G3062><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellowlabourers <S%G4904><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> names <S%G3686><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> the book <S%G976><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>.
Let <S%G1097><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> moderation <S%G1933><s%> be known <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5682><s%> unto all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G444><s%>. The YY <S%G2962><s%> is at hand <S%G1451><s%>.

Be careful <S%G3309><s%> <S%G5720><s%> for nothing <S%G3367><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every thing <S%G3956><s%> by prayer <S%G4335><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> supplication <S%G1162><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> let <S%G1107><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> requests <S%G155><s%> be made known <S%G1107><s%> <S%G5744><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the peace <S%G1515><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> passeht <S%G5242><s%> <S%G5723><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> understanding <S%G3563><s%>, shall keep <S%G5432><s%> <S%G5692><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> minds <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3540><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>.

Finally <S%G3063><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, whatsoever things <S%G3745><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> true <S%G227><s%>, whatsoever things <S%G3745><s%> are honest <S%G4586><s%>, whatsoever things <S%G3745><s%> are just <S%G1342><s%>, whatsoever things <S%G3745><s%> are pure <S%G53><s%>, whatsoever things <S%G3745><s%> are lovely <S%G4375><s%>, whatsoever things <S%G3745><s%> are of good report <S%G2163><s%>; if there be any <S%G1536><s%> virtue <S%G703><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> if there be any <S%G1536><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%>, think <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5737><s%> on these things <S%G5023><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> <S%G5644><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> greatly <S%G3171><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> at the last <S%G4218><s%> your care <S%G5426><s%> <S%G5721><s%> <S%G330><s%> of <S%G5228><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> hath flourished again <S%G330><s%> <S%G5627><s%>; wherein <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ye were <S%G5426><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> careful <S%G5426><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> ye lacked opportunity <S%G170><s%> <S%G5711><s%>.

Not <S%G3756><s%> that I speak <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> in respect <S%G3754><s%> <S%G2596><s%> of want <S%G5304><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> have learned <S%G3129><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> whatsoever state <S%G3739><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, therewith to be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> content <S%G842><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> both how to be abased <S%G5013><s%> <S%G5745><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> how to abound <S%G4052><s%> <S%G5721><s%>: every where <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> I am instructed <S%G3453><s%> <S%G5769><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> to be full <S%G5526><s%> <S%G5745><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to be hungry <S%G3983><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, both <S%G2532><s%> to abound <S%G4052><s%> <S%G5721><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to suffer need <S%G5302><s%> <S%G5745><s%>.
I can do <S%G2480><s%> <S%G5719><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> strengtheneth <S%G1743><s%> <S%G5723><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>.
Notwithstanding <S%G4133><s%> ye have well <S%G2573><s%> done <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, that ye did communicate with <S%G4790><s%> <S%G5660><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> affliction <S%G2347><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> Philippians <S%G5374><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> I departed <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>, no <S%G3762><s%> Congregation <S%G1577><s%> communicated with <S%G2841><s%> <S%G5656><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> as <S%G1519><s%> concerning <S%G3056><s%> giving <S%G1394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> receiving <S%G3028><s%>, but <S%G1508><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> only <S%G3441><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Thessalonica <S%G2332><s%> ye sent <S%G3992><s%> <S%G5656><s%> once <S%G2532><s%> <S%G530><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G1364><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3427><s%> necessity <S%G5532><s%>.

Not <S%G3756><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I desire <S%G1934><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a gift <S%G1390><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> I desire <S%G1934><s%> <S%G5719><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> that may abound <S%G4121><s%> <S%G5723><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> account <S%G3056><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I have <S%G568><s%> <S%G5719><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> abound <S%G4052><s%> <S%G5719><s%>: I am full <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5769><s%>, having received <S%G1209><s%> <S%G5666><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> Epaphroditus <S%G1891><s%> the things which were sent from <S%G3844><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, an odour <S%G3744><s%> of a sweet smell <S%G2175><s%>, a sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> acceptable <S%G1184><s%>, wellpleasing <S%G2101><s%> to 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> shall supply <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5692><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> unto 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> <S%G5663><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> saint <S%G40><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>. The brethren <S%G80><s%> which are with <S%G4862><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> <S%G5736><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

All <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> <S%G5736><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, <S%G1161><s%> chiefly <S%G3122><s%> they that are of <S%G1537><s%> Caesar's <S%G2541><s%> household <S%G3614><s%>.

The grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>. To <S%G4314><s%> the Philippians <S%G5374><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5648><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Rome <S%G4516><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> Epaphroditus <S%G1891><s%>.
